/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin/nvcc    -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/morphology.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/cuda/main_generated_morphology2d.cu.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/cuda/main_generated_morphology3d.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/main.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib
